name: Guardlex
tag_list: anti-piracy, intellectual-property-protection, takedown-services, guardlex, anti-piracy-services, protection, intellectual-property, guard, piracy, legal, dmca, digital-millennium-copyright-act, copyright-infringement, copyrights, copyright-protection, ta
overview: Guardlex provide anti-piracy and Intellectual Property protection services. There are different protection plan to satisfy everyone needs from creative artists to software developers. Also Guardlex features Pro-Active protection system that scans popular torrent trackers, underground communities and wares websites in order to find copyright infringements. For more information please visit Guardlex website.
